snippet.title: Hypnagogia 無限の夢 Boundless Dreams - Official 2021 Trailer
snippet.description:
Developed as a solo passion project in roughly 8 months by sodaraptor, coming to PC October 2021. Wishlist on Steam ➤➤➤ https://store.steampowered.com/app/1665500/Hypnagogia__Boundless_Dreams/

Following the events of the first game, Hypnagogia 無限の夢 Boundless Dreams again takes players on a unique and existential journey through a series of dream worlds that inevitably devolve into twisted nightmares. Throughout the game, feelings which mix wonder, nostalgia, loneliness, and absolute dread will overtake your senses and leave you with an unforgettable experience.

➤➤➤ Itch.io project page: https://sodaraptor.itch.io/hypnagogia-boundless-dreams

➤➤➤ Play the first game free here: https://sodaraptor.itch.io/hypnagogia

➤➤➤ Music credit: "White Sky" by SPURME https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/1020562
